Lyrics                         : [00:08.19]Are you someone that I can give my heart to? / [00:14.33]Or just the poison that I'm drawn to? / [00:18.18]It can be hard to tell the difference late at night / [00:23.91]Play fair, is that a compass in your nature? / [00:29.96]Or are you tricky? / [00:31.55]'Cause I've been there / [00:33.77]And baby, I don't need to learn my lesson twice / [00:38.64] / [00:41.72]But if you really wanna go there / [00:45.15]You should know I / [00:47.13]I need someone to hold me close, deeper than I've ever known / [00:50.82]Whose love feels like a rodeo, knows just how to take control / [00:55.54]When I'm vulnerable, he's straight-talking to my soul / [00:58.60]Conversation overload, got me feeling vertigo / [01:04.60]Are you somebody who can go there? / [01:08.71]'Cause I don't wanna have to show ya / [01:12.42]If that ain't you, then let me know, yeah / [01:16.53]'Cause training season's over (training season's over) / [01:26.39]I tried to see my lovers in a good light / [01:32.38]Don't wanna do it just to be nice / [01:36.07]Don't wanna have to teach you how to love me right / [01:41.85]I hope it hits me like an arrow / [01:47.40]Someone with some potential / [01:51.13]Is it too much to ask for, who understands? / [01:57.04]I need someone to hold me close, deeper than I've ever known / [02:01.16]Whose love feels like a rodeo, knows just how to take control / [02:06.89]When I'm vulnerable, he's straight-talking to my soul / [02:08.88]Conversation overload, got me feeling vertigo / [02:15.30]Are you somebody who can go there? / [02:19.19]'Cause I don't wanna have to show ya / [02:22.96]If that ain't you, then let me know, yeah / [02:26.74]'Cause training season's over / [02:29.69]Can you compete? / [02:31.69]Now is your time / [02:33.63]Run when you hear that whistle blow / [02:37.20]Are you on my team? / [02:39.56]Or stuck on the sidelines waiting for someone to tell you to go? / [02:47.77] / [02:50.19]For someone to tell you to go / [02:54.07]You should know I / [02:56.19]I need someone to hold me close, deeper than I've ever known / [02:59.64]Whose love feels like a rodeo, knows just how to take control / [03:05.50]When I'm vulnerable, he's straight-talking to my soul (if that ain't you, then let me know, yeah) / [03:07.41]Conversation overload 'cause training season's over / [03:09.19]'Cause training season's over (training season's over) / [03:17.49] / [03:25.01]Training season's over / [03:26.22]
